Verses: 1 adhaRkup pinbu yOsiyaa erusalEmilE karththarukkup paSkaavai aasariththaan; avargaL mudhalaam maadham padhinaalaandhEdhiyilE paSkaa aattukkuttiyai adiththaargaL.
2 avan aasaariyargaLai avargaL muRaivarisaigaLil vaiththu, avargaLaik karththarudaiya aalayaththil aaraadhanaiseyyath thittappaduththi,

3 iSravElaiyellaam ubadhEsikkiRavargaLum, karththarukkup parisuththamaakkappattavargaLumaagiya lEviyarai nOkki: parisuththap pettiyai dhaaveedhin kumaaranaagiya saalomOn ennum iSravElin raajaa kattina aalayaththilE vaiyungaL; thOLinmEl adhai sumakkum baaram ungaLukkuriyadhalla; ippOdhu neengaL ungaL dhEvanaagiya karththarukkum, avarudaiya janamaagiya iSravElukkum oozhiyancheydhu,

4 iSravElin raajaavaagiya dhaaveedhu ezhudhina kattaLaikkum, avan kumaaranaagiya saalomOn ezhudhina kattaLaikkum oththapadiyE ungaL pidhaakkaLin kudumbaththaarukkaagak kuRikkappatta varisaiyilE ungaLai aayaththappaduththiï¿½,
5 janangaLaagiya ungaL sagOdhararukkaagap parisuththa SthalaththilE pidhaakkaLudaiya vamsap pirivugaLinpadiyEyum, lEviyarudaiya vamsaththaar vagukkappattapadiyEyum nindru,
6 paSkaa aattukkuttiyai adiththu, ungaLaip parisuththampaNNi, mOsEyaikkoNdu karththar sonnapadiyE ungaL sagOdharar seyyumpadi, avargaLukku avaigaLai aayaththappaduththungaL endraan.

7 vandhirundha janangaL ellaarukkum, avargaL lakkaththinpadiyE, paSkaabalikkaaga muppadhinaayiram aattukkuttigaLaiyum, veLLaattukkuttigaLaiyum, moovaayiram kaaLaigaLaiyum, raajaavaagiya yOsiyaa thannudaiya aaSthiyilirundhu koduththaan.

8 avanudaiya prabukkaLum manappoorvamaana kaaNikkaiyaaga janaththiRkum aasaariyarukkum lEviyarukkum koduththaargaL; dhEvanudaiya aalaya visaaraNaikkarththaavaagiya ilkkiyaavum sagariyaavum yegiyElum aasaariyargaLukkup paSkaabalikkendru iraNdaayiraththu aRunooRu aattukkuttigaLaiyum, munnooRu kaaLaigaLaiyum koduththaargaL.

9 konaaniyaa, semaayEl, nedhaneyEl ennum avargaL sagOdhararum, asabiyaa, Eyel, yOsabaadh ennum lEviyarin prabukkaLum, lEviyarukkup paSkaa palikkendru aiyaayiram aattukkuttigaLaiyum ainnooRu kaaLaigaLaiyum koduththaargaL.
10 ippadi aaraadhanai thittampaNNappattapOdhu, raajaavinudaiya kattaLaiyinpadiyE, aasaariyar thangaL Sthaanaththilum, lEviyar thangaL vaguppugaLin varisaiyilum nindru,
11 paSkaa aattukkuttiyai adiththaargaL; aasaariyar avargaL kaiyilirundhu raththaththai vaangith theLiththaargaL; lEviyar thOluriththaargaL.

12 mOsEyin puSthagaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRapadi janangaL karththarukkup paliseluththumpadi, avargaL thaganapali mirugangaLaip pidhaakkaLudaiya vamsappirivugaLinpadiyE, ivargaLukkuk kodukkaththakkadhaai avaigaLaip piriththuvaiththaargaL; kaaLaigaLaiyum appadiyE seydhaargaL.

13 avargaL paSkaa aattukkuttiyai nyaayamuRaimaiyinpadiyE akkiniyil poriththu, parisuththamaakkappatta matravaigaLaip paanaigaLilum kopparaigaLilum sattigaLilum samaiththu, janangaLukkellaam theeviramaaip pangittukkoduththaargaL.

14 pinbu thangaLukkaagavum aasaariyarukkaagavum aayaththappaduththinaargaL; aarOnin puththiraraagiya aasaariyargaL sarvaanga thaganapaligaLaiyum niNaththaiyumseluththugiRadhil, iravumattum vElaiyaayirundhapadiyinaal, lEviyar thangaLukkaagavum, aarOnin puththiraraagiya aasaariyarukkaagavum aayaththappaduththinaargaL.

15 dhaaveedhum, aasaabum, Emaanum, raajaavin gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya edhuththoonum kaRpiththapadiyE, aasaabin puththiraraagiya paadagar thangaL Sthaanaththilum, vaasalkaavalaaLar ovvoru vaasalilum nindraargaL; avargaL thangaL oozhiyaththai vittu vilagak koodaadhirundhadhu; lEviyaraana avargaL sagOdharar avargaLukkaaga aayaththappaduththinaargaL.

16 appadiyE raajaavaagiya yOsiyaavinudaiya kattaLaippadi, paSkaavai aasarikkiRadhaRkum, karththarudaiya palipeedaththinmEl sarvaanga thaganapaligaLai idugiRadhaRkum aduththa karththarudaiya aaraadhanaiyellaam andraiyadhinam thittamaai seyyappattadhu.
17 angE vandhirundha iSravEl puththirar akkaalaththil paSkaavaiyum, puLippillaadha appappaNdigaiyaiyum EzhunaaLaLavum aasariththaargaL.

18 theerkkadharisiyaagiya saamuvElinnaaL thodangi, iSravElilE appadikkoththa paSkaa aasarikkappadavillai; yOsiyaavum, aasaariyarum, lEviyarum, yoodhaavanaiththum, iSravElil vandhirundhavargaLum, erusalEmin kudigaLum aasariththa paSkaavaippOla iSravEl raajaakkaLil oruvarum aasariththadhillai.
19 yOsiyaavudaiya raajyabaaraththin padhinettaam varushaththilE indhap paSkaa aasarikkappattadhu.

20 yOsiyaa dhEvaalayaththiRku aduththadhaith thittappaduththina indha ellaa nadapadigaLukkumpinbu, egipthinraajaavaagiya nEkO aipiraaththu nadhiyOramaana karkEmiS pattaththinmEl yuththampaNNa vandhaan; appozhudhu yOsiyaa avanukku virOdhamaai yuththancheyyap puRappattaan.

21 avan ivanidaththukku SthaanaapadhigaLai anuppi: yoodhaavin raajaavE, enakkum umakkum enna? naan ippOdhu umakku virOdhamaai alla, ennOdE yuththampaNNugiRa oruvanukku virOdhamaaip pOgiREn; naan theevirikkavENdumendru dhEvan sonnaar; dhEvan ennOdirukkiRaar; avar ummai azhikkaadhapadikku avarukku edhiridaiseyvadhai vittuvidum endru sollachchonnaan.

22 aanaalum yOsiyaa than mugaththai avanai vittuth thiruppaamalum, nEkO sonna avanudaiya vaayin vaarththaigaLukku sevikodaamalum avanOdE yuththampaNNa vEshammaaRi, megidhOvin paLLaththaakkilE yuththampaNNugiRadhaRku vandhaan.
23 vilveerar yOsiyaa raajaavinmEl ambeydhaargaL; appozhudhu raajaa than oozhiyakkaararai nOkki: ennai appuRam koNdupOngaL, enakkuk kodiya kaayampattadhu endraan.

24 appozhudhu avanudaiya oozhiyakkaarar andha radhaththin mElirundha avanai iRakki, avanukku irundha iraNdaavadhu radhaththinmEl Etri avanai erusalEmukkuk koNduvandhaargaL; avan maraNamadaindhu than pidhaakkaLin kallaRaiyil adakkampaNNappattaan; yoodhaavilum erusalEmilumuLLa yaavarum yOsiyaavukkaaga dhukkankoNdaadinaargaL.

25 erEmiyaa yOsiyaavinmEl pulambal paadinaan; sagala paadagarum paadagigaLum innaaLvaraikkum thangaL pulambalgaLil yOsiyaavinmEl paadugiRaargaL; avaigaL innaaLvaraikkum iSravElilE vazhangivarugiRadhu; avaigaL pulambalin puSthagaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRadhu.
26 yOsiyaavin matra varththamaanangaLum, karththarudaiya nyaayappramaaNaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRadhaRkoththa avan seydha nanmaigaLum,
27 avanudaiya aadhiyOdandha nadapadigaLum, iSravEl yoodhaa raajaakkaLinpuSthagaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRadhu.
